StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [UpdateApplicant]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@NWAID int, @OrgID int, @RecruiterID int, @UserLogin varchar(15) AS
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM NWA WHERE NWA_ID = @NWAID) BEGIN UPDATE NWA SET ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID = @OrgID, RECRUITER_OF_RECORD_ID = @RecruiterID, USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE NWA_ID = @NWAID END
